alert.note: Alert for North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 4:40PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Arapahoe, central Denver and southwestern Adams Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 440 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over northwestern Aurora, or 6 miles east of Denver, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eastern Denver, Aurora, eastern Centennial, southwestern Commerce City, Arapahoe Park and Buckley AFB. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County
